website_summaries.verdict: Often used for morning sickness or chemotherapy reactions, these lozenges contain natural ingredients that are great for kids, too.
pros: Contains essential oils and plant botanicals proven to relieve nausea
Ingredients include essential oils of sour raspberry, ginger, natural cola, banana, and green tea with lemon
cons: May only help for 30-40 minutes, so best for shorter trips

customer_reviews.title: Drug-free for Chemo Patients
customer_reviews.text: I first received these as a Holiday gift in December 2019 from another chemo patient. Boy, what a lifesaver! It curved my nausea. It works. They’re a challenge to find in my hometown because they keep selling out. I was happy to find them at such a great price on Amazon. Admittedly, I counted my stash because of the reviews. I’m happy to report that I received a bonus - one extra! I highly recommend them. ☺️
customer_reviews.author: TheDesigner

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t get every flavor
customer_reviews.text: I’m typically not a fan of banana flavored things as it is, but the other four flavors looked good, so I picked these up. I don’t think every flavor made it into my container; there are no green tea ones, and only three cola ones. Most of the package is either banana (which I find disgusting) and ginger (which is a little too strong).
customer_reviews.author: SvenskaSpark

customer_reviews.title: Not a good variety pack. Stick to the single flavor packs so you don’t get jipped.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 2 stars bc the variety pack is a joke. The ginger flavor taste spicy and salty which is nasty. There were 20 ginger in the pack only 5 of the raspberry, 3 cola and NO banana. The rest are the green tea which are good but of course the good flavors were not in excess. With the ginger being more then half the pack and me not being able to eat them it seems like a waste of money. They do help with morning sickness without all the sugar that is in preggo pops!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: I have epilepsy and a side effect of my illness and all the drugs I’m on is extreme nausea. I hate having to take more drugs to counteract the side effects of other drugs. These have proven to be a great alternative. I like the flavors. They don’t taste medicine-y. I would absolutely recommend if you suffer from nausea.
customer_reviews.author: Jencat

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law had cancer at the time and I wanted to get her something useful because she didn’t have much time left. Her mouth is always dry and she didn’t have much of an appetite. But this was fun for her. She loved them
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Based on the description saying all natural relief I was excited. But once I received them, I saw the actual ingredients and its mostly just corn syrup... They taste amazing and I like the variety. I don't think they actually helped my nausea at all. Wouldn't buy it again. Might as well just buy real candy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my dad who is going through ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dad who is going through chemo for stage 4 esophageal cancer. They help a lot. They don't bring back his appetite, but they definitely quell the queasiness. I am so thankful for these, they are the least I can get for him while he's going through this.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for queasiness
customer_reviews.text: They are great for upset digestion and I like the variety of flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: These really Work to quell nausea
customer_reviews.text: Very good flavors and they actually Work. I have bought them for my sisters in arms who are also going through nausea and we are all so happy to have these. I am glad to have a variety of flavors to chose from.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ratz

customer_reviews.title: They are helping
customer_reviews.text: As an add on to other meds, these seem to be helping a chemo patient we bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: P. B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the flavor, plus, they absolutely did not work for me. I'm in my third trimester and I still struggle with nausea.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa J.

customer_reviews.title: Ginger burns chemo and radiation throat
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these. Flavor etc is good but the ginger is so peppery, it irritates my otherwise irritated mouth and throat. Not worth the possible nausea relief. Did not even bother testing the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: WookieMom

customer_reviews.title: They taste OK, but a container came with 80% one flavor and two or three pieces of each other
customer_reviews.text: They taste OK, but a container came with 80% one flavor and two or three pieces of each other
customer_reviews.author: ASW

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: These have been really helping me through chemo I highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Adav19

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My cousin has cancer and is constantly nauseated he loves these. Flavor is great and helps the nausea.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Holt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely queasiness from cancer and motion sickness
customer_reviews.text: I sent these to my aunt who had cancer. She said these and the lollipops really helped with the nausea from chemotherapy. I used these for mild motion sickness. and they taste OK too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Persaud

customer_reviews.title: Great natural remedy
customer_reviews.text: Greatest natural remedy for nasea I've ever tried! I've been suffering for years now with a chronic illness that causes me to become very nauseous quite quickly. These calm me down and soothe my stomach nearly instantly! I'll never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Lauretta

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister who is going through chemo she said they are very good and helps her throat and tummy a lot. She uses them with each treatment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my pregnant co-worker and she loves them!1
customer_reviews.author: Tina Asher

customer_reviews.title: Helping a friend
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend. She said the raspberry flavor was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Allison L

customer_reviews.title: Helps me alot
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver. I got some from a coworker early in my pregnancy due to severe morning sickness, and this has help me so much during car rides or random times at work. I purchased my own.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Murray

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: This is a large jar! I've gotten the small container before. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: k.bar

customer_reviews.title: But they all taste like straight up ginger
customer_reviews.text: I don't remember reading anywhere that these were ginger drops. But they all taste like straight up ginger. So overwhelming, and for someone who does not care for ginger... I can't eat them. Was hopeful that I found something different when I came across these but they are just like the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Sparks

customer_reviews.title: not quite sure if it worked
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my mom who's going through chemo. she says the taste is good but it doesn't really help
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and helpful
customer_reviews.text: These really work as described. They help my nausea and I kept them in my purse at all times. The flavor is good to.
customer_reviews.author: April K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dad is going through chemo & this helps to alleviate the metallic taste from it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I found queasy drops very helpful for my nausea. I just wish you could buy individual flavors because the sour raspberry is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zwick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only strawberry is a good flavor all the rest taste like crap
customer_reviews.author: Leeana Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Such relief
customer_reviews.text: These really work - not sure how but they help nausea so much!
customer_reviews.author: boofreak

customer_reviews.title: These really help. I'm going through chemo right now ...
customer_reviews.text: These really help. I'm going through chemo right now and I haven't had to use any medication at all. I just use these and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Motion sickness
customer_reviews.text: I have motion sickness and find that Queasy drops have helped.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNE M. BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Tasted bad
customer_reviews.text: Tasted horrible. I used for chemo nausea. They didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Burton

customer_reviews.title: Items didn’t match description
customer_reviews.text: These came pretty quickly but I only received 2 containers instead of 3
customer_reviews.author: jeremy forster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best help for nauseas! These drops have been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Ransom

customer_reviews.title: TASTE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I first tried these while going thru chemo. I was given a sample and checked on Amazon and saw that they offered them. They work really good on the nausea. I would recommend them if you have nausea issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mayo74

customer_reviews.title: Actually work and taste good
customer_reviews.text: My doctor is tapering me off of a benzo medication and the side effects that come with the withdrawals are nasty. Lots of stomach issues. These came in the mail today and I immediately put one in my mouth. I'm not nauseous for the first time in 4 days. Considering ordering a case just to have on hand xD
customer_reviews.author: Lluna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We keep these in the car for when the kids get carsick. I have also used them during pregnancy. I love this product! They help with nausea a lot. The container they come in is helpful too!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: They work for my nephew who just stated treatments.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew just started chemo and radiation last week these do help. Thank you and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: JMD55

customer_reviews.title: Great for chemo treatments
customer_reviews.text: These were a God-send. My wife was getting chemo treatments, and these helped stop mild nausea bouts that crept up from time to time, especially in the car. She recommended them to others quite often. If you get severe nausea, these probably won't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brawn

customer_reviews.title: Loved all except 1 flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love all the flavors except the ginger i threw those out my tongue felt like it was burning
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: I get motion sickness easily and as I was preparing for a trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: I get motion sickness easily and as I was preparing for a trip to Maui my sister recommended these to help. I am glad I got them. I don't know if it was just something to distract my mind (sucking on a candy like lozenge) or actually something that's in them but I feel they worked. I took Dramamine and sucked on these lozenges and didn't feel sick & we had a bumpy 6.5hr flight!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: This is the end one I ordered. He said he love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this product several times for several friends and got positive feedback from everyone. Cancer s**ks!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Love the raspberry
customer_reviews.text: I love the raspberry flavor the best, I’ve tried all flavors but prefer the raspberry. I have since bought the raspberry flavor several times
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Helped chemo patient with nausea
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. I wish you could buy single flavor because we definitely had a favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Queasy drops for nausea
customer_reviews.text: Queasy drops-delicious with real fruit flavors. I eat them even when I'm not queasy from my own lousy cooking(cooking challenged). They melt very slowly in the mouth. Small pieces, multiflavored. RECOMMEND: buy.
customer_reviews.author: Allen NakagawaTop Contributor: Camping

product_meta.title: Three Lollies Assorted Queasy Drops for Nausea Relief, 48 Count
product_meta.description:
Say goodbye to morning sickness and a queasy tummy with Three Lollies Queasy Drops Assorted for Nausea Relief! Each drop contains powerful essential oils and plant botanicals proven to relieve nausea and queasy stomach due to pregnancy, labor medications, vitamins and supplements, even post-anesthesia and surgery. Three Lollies products are all-natural, drug-free, chemical-free and organic so its 100% safe for mom and baby. 

Finally an alternative to traditional old saltine crackers or thick cola syrups. Great tasting, fast-acting and highly effective at combating your nausea and upset stomach with absolutely no side effects. Made with powerful essential oils of fruit and plant botanicals that are proven to help relieve nausea. Contains no artificial flavors or colors. Alleviates dry mouth during labor and provides a quick energy boost. Also makes a safe, more effective alternative to plain ice chips or gum. 

Each piece is individually wrapped for convenience so they are perfect to take along in your purse, labor bag, pocket, diaper bag, luggage, computer bag, briefcase or to always keep handy in the glove compartment of your car. Goes to work immediately on your upset stomach. Recommended by doctors and healthcare professionals. 

A box of our most effective flavors contain Green Tea with Lemon, Ginger, Banana, Sour Raspberry & Cola, each individually-wrapped lollipops within a container. See all our Three Lollies products: Preggie Pops for strong morning sickness relief, Preggie Pop Drops Plus with 10mg vitamin B6 for extra-strong morning sickness relief and finally Queasy Pops for all-purpose nausea relief due to sickness, traveling, car/air travel, pregnancy, morning sickness, medications – even chemotherapy and post-anesthesia. Enjoy relief today!
feature_bullets: Perfect remedy for morning sickness and a queasy tummy!
Natural essential oils and plant botanicals used to relieve nausea
Lozenges in Delicious Natural Flavors Sour Raspberry - Green Tea with Lemon - Ginger - Banana - Natural Cola
All natural and drug free and 100% safe for mom and baby, and Healthcare Professional recommended.
Twist-off container with each piece individually wrapped, Gluten-Free and Kosher!
